effect.x-y: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

short_effect.x-y: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.x-y: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat. This move can also shatter rocks in the field.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat. This move can also shatter rocks in the field.
